00034 #define HTML_DIALOG(filename) \
00035 { \
00036     CHTMLDialog *dlg = new CHTMLDialog( filename, 0, "HTML_DIALOG" ); \
00037     dlg->exec(); \
00038     ASSERT(dlg); \
00039     if (dlg) \
00040         delete dlg; \
00041 };
